lastReason: web_fetch: / returns Streamlit shell and /_stcore/health returns ok; browser(openclaw) snapshot confirms interactive UI (資料模式 radio options + sliders + app header/content), no blank Running shell, and no `無法取得台股股票池` error.
lastFixSummary: Enforced websocket stability flags directly in Render start command (--server.enableWebsocketCompression false --server.websocketPingInterval 30) so runtime cannot ignore .streamlit config during bootstrap.
